SourceType:
Whether the module uses Verts or Surfaces for locations.

VERTSURFACESOURCE_Vert          - Use Verts as the source locations.
VERTSURFACESOURCE_Surface       - Use Surfaces as the source locations.
UniversalOffset: An offset to apply to each vert/surface
InheritVelocityScale: A scale on how much of the bone's velocity a particle will inherit.
SkelMeshActorParamName: The parameter name of the skeletal mesh actor that supplies the SkelMeshComponent for in-game.
EditorSkelMesh: The name of the skeletal mesh to use in the editor
ValidAssociatedBones: This module will only spawn from verts or surfaces associated with the bones in this list
NormalToCompare: Use this normal to restrict spawning locations
NormalCheckToleranceDegrees: Normal tolerance.  0 degrees means it must be an exact match, 180 degrees means it can be any angle.
ValidMaterialIndices:
Array of material indices that are valid materials to spawn from.
If empty, any material will be considered valid
InheritUVChannel: UV channel to inherit from the spawn mesh, internally clamped to those available.
bUpdatePositionEachFrame: If true, update the particle locations each frame with that of the vert/surface
bOrientMeshEmitters: If true, rotate mesh emitter meshes to orient w/ the vert/surface
bInheritBoneVelocity: If true, particles inherit the associated bone velocity when spawned
bEnforceNormalCheck: When true use the RestrictToNormal and NormalTolerance values to check surface normals
bInheritVertexColor: If true, particles inherit the associated vertex color on spawn. This feature is not supported for GPU particles.
bInheritUV: If true, particles inherit the associated UV data on spawn. Accessed through dynamic parameter module X and Y, must be a "Spawn Time Only" parameter on "AutoSet" mode. This feature is not supported for GPU particles.
